Texts.Eng: I found the core of a Violated Elite Drahl's ion cannon. The weapon itself is damaged beyond repair, but perhaps this core can still be repurposed. ^green;I should visit the weaponsmith in the Starfarer's Refuge ^white;- if anyone can build a weapon with this, it is Ayurin.
I have never seen anything like this before, Captain! I can try to build a weapon from it, but it will be a challenge.
